detail_desc: Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and flared, elbow-length sleeves.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Hoop earrings in metal and plastic. Diameter 3 cm and 2.5 cm.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with a soft, stretchy shaft and loop at the back. Jersey linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky soles. Heel 5 cm.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Oversized top in block-patterned sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a ribbed hem. Lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Brushed inside.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave. Round neckline with gathers at the front and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and an elasticated seam with a detachable tie belt under the bust. Jersey lining.
Earmuffs in faux fur with an imitation leather headband.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Playsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated edge at the back. Elasticated seam and a decorative bow at the waist, diagonal side pockets and short legs. Unlined.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and short shorts. Top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist and short slits in the sides.
Leggings in stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jeans in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative metal studs. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined. The jacket is PETA Approved Vegan-certified and meets PETA’s requirements for vegan products. This certification guarantees that the product is entirely free from materials and substances of animal origin.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is partly recycled.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in stretch denim with a coated finish, regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sequined motif on the front.
Jacquard-knit jumper in an airy ramie and viscose blend with a collar, button placket, long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a knot detail at the hem.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Dress in patterned, lightweight viscose twill. Rounded collar with a small frill trim, buttons at the top, and a frill-trimmed yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details, removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Fine-knit liner socks designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have a ribbed section in the middle of the foot and elastication around the openings for optimum comfort.
Fully lined bikini top with short frilled sleeves, a wrapover front with decorative frills and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Decorative ties at the hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft in stretch, ribbed fabric, and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam under the bust. Unlined.
Loose-fit trousers in woven fabric with a detachable tie belt and zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Fake jetted pockets in the sides and at the back, and tapered legs.

Softshell jacket in water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elastic drawstring and small peak, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket with a zip and earphone outlet on the inside, zipped side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Thermal fleece inside. Size of chest pocket approx. 12x17 cm.
Long-sleeved mesh body with a V-neck front and back and a concealed fastening at the crotch. Transparent elastic panels down the front of the neckline and at the waist. Partly lined.
Signet ring in gold-plated metal.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets with a button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sandals in imitation leather with a shimmering metallic finish. Adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Nursing jumper in a soft, fine-knit containing some wool with slits and ties at the sides for easy nursing access, 3/4-length sleeves with a lace trim, and a lace-trimmed hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with pattern-knit stripes, a button placket and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut jacket in a patterned linen and viscose weave with notch lapels, buttons at the front, welt front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey. Short sleeves with striped, ribbed trims.
Fitted, long-sleeved tops in stretch organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, classic front, chest pocket and rounded hem. Easy-iron finish.
Push-up bra in mesh and lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back, and a slit at the front of the hem. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a text print, small embroidery detail at the front and a straight-cut hem.

Short dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. High stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and wide, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Flared style with a double-layered, low-cut skirt with a flounce at the hem. V-neck underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.
Glittery gift box containing a metal ring and necklace. Size-adjustable ring. Necklace with a heart-shaped pendant with plastic rhinestones.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Straight-cut T-shirt in imitation suede.
Short skirt with a zip at the back. Lined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Print motif down one leg and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Jumper in a cotton knit with a rounded, woven collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The jumper has a gently rounded longer layer in a cotton weave at the hem.
Imitation suede sandals with covered block heels, a wide foot strap and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and short chain. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 9 cm.
Shirt in a linen and cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem.
Mesh trainers with lacing and a loop front and the back. Mesh linings and insoles and lightweight ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Purl-knit jumper in soft cotton with buttons on one shoulder, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Hat in soft garter-stitched cotton with a ribbed hem.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Short sleeves with smocked trims and smocking at the top and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a crocheted lace trim at the hem.

Short jacket in soft cotton twill with a drawstring hood, concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with press-studs. Covered elastication at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Top in satin with lace details, a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short skirt in sturdy, textured, elasticated fabric with a visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Shorts in checked flannel with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Sandals with a zip and loop at the back of the heels. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Hat in a supersoft, brushed knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved, rounded poncho in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood and kangaroo pocket.

Suit trousers in a textured wool weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Jersey leggings with decorative zips at the top, seams down the legs and a zip at the hems. Wide jersey ribbing for optimum fit.
Hat in braided paper straw with a band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with embroidery, ribbons and tassels at the top, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
